input.sentences: my brother | [male] | working on his project on the computer .
there were lot of dry leaves on our driveway .
i went to grocery shopping in organization .

output.sentences: A man is working on a project on his computer.
As he works, his attention drifts to the window, as he's distracted by the leaves blowing though the empty parking lot below.
He decides to take a break and run some errands, heading to shop at a nearby grocery store.
He picks up some orange juice so he can have some for his breakfast.
After making his purchases, he stopped at a bank to rob it before heading home.
